body: Hmm, this is an interesting point. I moved the data ptr into TensorDescriptor mostly to make the benchmark code look better after I deleted the `Convolution` struct, because otherwise I would have needed to add a big pile of extra parameters to thread the pointers through otherwise. I guess I can bring a `Convolution`-like struct to get rid of this situation.
